fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 146.95 points or 0.75% to settle at 19,711.45. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, jumped 5.92% to 11.32. HDFC Bank, Reliance Industries and Infosys were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
